description: Email verification tokens expiring too quickly
rootCause: Token TTL set to 5 minutes, users couldn't verify in time
resolution: Increased TTL to 24 hours, added resend functionality
prevention: For user-facing tokens, use longer TTLs (hours not minutes)

description: S3 upload failed with CORS error
rootCause: S3 bucket CORS policy didn't allow PUT from frontend domain
resolution: Updated S3 CORS configuration to allow frontend origin
prevention: Always configure CORS for S3 buckets before implementing upload features

description: API validation errors not properly formatted
rootCause: Zod error format different from existing error structure
resolution: Created error transformer to normalize Zod errors
prevention: Define standard error format early, transform all errors to match
